price: 68. Were it not a previous ordainment from Allâh, a severe torment would have touched you for what you took.
arabic: لَّوۡلَا كِتَٰبٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ سَبَقَ لَمَسَّكُمۡ فِيمَآ أَخَذۡتُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: lawlā kitābun mina al-lahi sabaqa lamassakum fīmā akhadhtum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
